pred_diverse_ans: Light reactions occur in the light-dependent reactions stage of photosynthesis.
During photosynthesis, light reactions take place during the light-dependent reactions stage.

During the photosynthesis process, light reactions occur in the following stages:

1. Light-dependent reactions ( Stage 1)
2. Light-independent reactions (Stage 2)
Light reactions take place in the first stage of photosynthesis: light absorption.
